00037 #ifndef EGS_PYRAMID_
00038 #define EGS_PYRAMID_

00041 #include "egs_polygon.h"

00106 template <class T>
00107 class EGS_PYRAMID_EXPORT EGS_PyramidT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00108 
00109 protected:
00110 
00111     T             *p;   
00112     EGS_Vector    xo;   
00113     EGS_2DVector  xop;  
00114     EGS_Vector    a;    
00115     EGS_Float     d;    
00116     int           n;    
00117     EGS_Polygon   **s;  
00118     bool          open; 
00119 
00120 public:
00121 
00129     EGS_PyramidT(T *P, const EGS_Vector &Xo, bool O=true, const string &N="");
00130 
00131     ~EGS_PyramidT() {
00132         delete p;
00133         for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00134             delete s[j];
00135         }
00136         delete [] s;
00137     };
00138 
00139     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00140         EGS_Vector xp(x-xo);
00141         EGS_Float axp = a*xp;
00142         if (axp > 0) {
00143             return false;
00144         }
00145         //if( axp > -1e-10 ) return true;
00146         if (!open  && d + axp < 0) {
00147             return false;
00148         }
00149         EGS_Float t = -d/axp;
00150         //return p->isInside2D(xop+p->getProjection(xp)*t);
00151         return p->isInside2D(p->getProjection(xo + t*xp));
00152     };
00153 
00154     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00155         if (isInside(x)) {
00156             return 0;
00157         }
00158         else {
00159             return -1;
00160         }
00161     };
00162     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00163         return isWhere(x);
00164     };
00165 
00166     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00167                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00168         int jhit=-1;
00169         if (ireg == 0) {
00170             int convex = p->isConvex();
00171             for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00172                 if (convex || s[j]->isInside2D(x)) {
00173                     if (s[j]->isInside(x))
00174                         if (s[j]->howfar(true,x,u,t)) {
00175                             jhit = j;
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178             }
00179             if (!open) {
00180                 if (p->howfar(true,x,u,t)) {
00181                     jhit = n;
00182                 }
00183             }
00184             if (jhit < 0) {
00185                 return ireg;
00186             }
00187             if (newmed) {
00188                 *newmed = -1;
00189             }
00190             if (normal) *normal = jhit < n ? s[jhit]->getNormal() :
00191                                       p->getNormal();
00192             return -1;
00193         }
00194         for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00195             //bool in = s[j]->isInside(x) && s[j]->isInside2D(x);
00196             EGS_Float up = u*s[j]->getNormal(), xp = s[j]->distance(x);
00197             if (up > 0 && xp < 0) {
00198                 EGS_Float tt = -xp/up;
00199                 if (tt <= t && s[j]->isInside2D(x+u*tt)) {
00200                     t = tt;
00201                     jhit = j;
00202                 }
00203             }
00204         }
00205         if (!open) {
00206             EGS_Float up = u*p->getNormal(), xp = p->distance(x);
00207             if (up > 0 && xp < 0) {
00208                 EGS_Float tt = -xp/up;
00209                 if (tt <= t && p->isInside2D(x+u*tt)) {
00210                     t = tt;
00211                     jhit = n;
00212                 }
00213             }
00214         }
00215         if (jhit < 0) {
00216             return ireg;
00217         }
00218         if (newmed) {
00219             *newmed = med;
00220         }
00221         if (normal) *normal = jhit < n ? s[jhit]->getNormal()*(-1) :
00222                                   p->getNormal()*(-1);
00223         return 0;
00224     };
00225 
00226     // TODO: optimize. this implementation is waaaay too slow.
00227     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00228         EGS_Float tperp = 1e30;
00229         for (int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00230             EGS_Float t = s[j]->hownear(true,x);
00231             if (t < tperp) {
00232                 if (t <= 0) {
00233                     return 0;
00234                 }
00235                 tperp = t;
00236             }
00237         }
00238         if (!open) {
00239             EGS_Float t = p->hownear(true,x);
00240             if (t < tperp) {
00241                 tperp = t;
00242             }
00243         }
00244         return tperp;
00245     };
00246 
00247     const string &getType() const {
00248         return p->getType();
00249     };
00250 
00251     void printInfo() const;
00252 
00253 };
00254 
00255 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonYZ> EGS_PyramidX;
00256 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonXZ> EGS_PyramidY;
00257 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_PolygonXY> EGS_PyramidZ;
00258 typedef EGS_PyramidT<EGS_Polygon> EGS_Pyramid;

00260 #endif
